channel.title: Just a few questions
channel.description:
Hey everyone, my new server chatscape is now semi operational, there are only a few things holding it back.
1. i've created my own client based off of eyrescape, in the readme file it states that you have to have the .file store 32 file in another file named cache. This "cache" is making the client pretty big so that it might discourage people. I need to know if you can run it without the cache.
2. as i said before i made a client based off of eyrescape, what i need now is a webclient. I found a tutorial mabey two weeks ago, followed it to the letter, but the following app simply said "applet notinited" any help or ideas?
3. If you have some spare time check out the website i set up chatsscape.co.nr, im open to any suggestions!

item.title: Just a few questions

his account probably got jacked, look at his siggy. I kinda feel bad for him, hes gonna have no reputation here, except for a flaming fag

EH, anyways does anyone have any ideas or suggestions, i can see you viewing this : )

  1. i’ve created my own client based off of eyrescape, in the readme file it states that you have to have the .file store 32 file in another file named cache. This “cache” is making the client pretty big so that it might discourage people. I need to know if you can run it without the cache.
